Get the latest sports news curated from reliable sources, all in one place.

In-Depth Coverage: Dive deeper into detailed news stories for an enhanced reading experience.

Personalized Experience: Save your favorite news articles to read offline anytime, anywhere.

Fast and Intuitive: Enjoy a smooth and user-friendly interface designed for sports enthusiasts.

All Things Sports: From trending highlights to exclusive stories, we bring the sports world closer to you.
Your favourites is empty! Go READ and SAVE your FAVOURITE NEWS!!!

The application is built using a single activity, with multiple fragments managing the UI and functionality. This ensures efficient navigation and a clean architecture.

Room Database: The app uses Room Database to store and manage news articles locally. Data is scraped from various news websites and saved for offline access.

Global News Coverage: The app displays the latest news articles from around the world. The data is dynamically loaded from the local database for a smooth user experience.

Navigation Drawer: A user-friendly navigation drawer allows seamless switching between different sections of the app, such as HOME, LIKE NEWS, ABOUT US, HELP.

Offline Access: Users can save news articles for offline reading. Saved articles can be easily accessed via the Saved News section in the navigation drawer.
